content.detailedDescription:
This sighting occured the same night as the indiana fireball, but hours earlier than that reported events and 1000 miles east.

driving home from a local diner after a local show, i was driving east thru town to my house, 3 minutes from the dinner.  i was heading straight towards a park adjacent to a catholic church.  there were low clouds in the sky in the direcftion i was driving.

when i got the the t-stop at the park, what looked like a spotlight shot across the sky from the west to the east.  i first thought it was maybe a relection from a car across the aprk, but i heard no engines noises that matched the light's rate of speed.  it moved too fast to be a plane or helicopter, plus there was no engine noise indicative of aircraft.  there were no events that night in town that warrented a spotlight, nor did the light return or seem to be coming from the ground.  

the light, which was bluish-white, appeared to be above the clouds, illuminating an area of clouds directly where it was passing over.  it went from far-right to far-left of my field of vision in 2-3 seconds, moving in a direct, straight line, producing no noise or cloud disturbance.  i lost sight of the object after it went beyond the tops of trees and homes on the east side of town.  although i could not see the object directly, the size of the light on the clouds indicated it was low, as the cloud cover was quite low.  i searched the sky the rest of the drive home, but did not see it again.

posting about my sighting on facebook, a friend in the next town over, to the east, claimed she saw the same light at nearly the same time.  it may have been a fireball, given their prevalance lately, and due to the fact that a bluish-white fireball was directly seen the same night in indiana, but it did not appear to "flame in" or out as fireballs do, but held the same colour and luminosity for the duration of my sighting.
content.summary: Bright light moving fast above clouds

content.detailedDescription: I had just walked out the kitchen door with a small bag of garbage and just happened to look up at the sky above the patio off the living room door and saw what looked to be a cigar ?? type object hovering over the same area i had recently sighted a bar bell type object, which i had previously reported to mufon; which, also, had hovered in about the same section of sky. i then went in the house for a camera and woke my wife up and told her of my seeing the ufo. she too went out and also sighted the craft which was now in the nnw section and i got one picture of the craft but a second picture turned out really odd for my kodak cx6330 camera.
content.summary: My wife and i saw a cigar type craft in sedona az

content.detailedDescription: As usual (every morning) i was sitting in my back yard, in my recliner watching the stars, facing west.  i had just watched a commercial air-line heading west.  as i looked back (couple moments later), about 30 degree off the north-west horizon traveling south-east...And object, the size of the largest star (white in color, not flashing, height unknown, (too much early commute traffic to hear any sound)...As high as the stars, and directly over head? i watch this object from 5:37am until it was out of my sight (my roof) ... guesstimating it would have taking 4-5 minutes from horizon to horizon.  ive never seen a commercial air-lines flying in this flight pattern...It was not flashing, a solid white light.
content.summary: Star-like light (object) abserved north-west traveling stright-line south-east

content.detailedDescription:
First of all, i have seen a lot of crafts around my home for over a year now. so to see these is no shocker any longer. on sept 29th at 9:30 pm i looked to the east and seen the craft above our small town of 7500 residents. i am at a higher elevation, and 3 miles from town. looking over i can see the lights of the town at night and there was a craft which hovered there for at least 2 hrs that i watched it. i called a friend from town who walked out and looked to the sky and seen it instantly. he than had a neighbor who he had witnessed this event with him. the following day, i asked a few people if they saw it? and they looked at me like i was crazy.
on the 30th of september, i looked up, but it was too cloudy to really see anything happening, but last night, october 1st i looked up at around 11.00 pm and seen a craft move around our town in the sky, but they were further into the sky than the first time i seen them. i would say at least, 2 miles up. i pondered the idea and decided to call 911.
i said this is no emergency, but has anyone reported ufo's above warrenton...? he laughed and said no, you are the first. well he wanted to know if i have had anything to drink? which i replied, i do not drink or do drugs. so he sent me 2 patrol cars out to investigate if i was a deranged person. upon the arrival of the 2 patrolman we did not talk much for they were in ah over the sight of the ufo's. we picked out 5 that we could see around our small town and also around my farm home. no one could explain what we witnessed but the officers did agree, they were ufo's. the time now was about 1 am when they left and i went to bed. but, if those officers were non-believer before they talked with me. they definitely believed when they left. i told them that the activity starts around 9-10 pm when they are the closest to the town. we will be looking up again tonight and into the following night to see this wonderest event.
content.summary: Large ufo hovered over the city of warrenton,mo.

content.detailedDescription: For the last three years i have done a lot of research on nibiru along with several other topics. i spent a lot of time this summer up in the mountains camping,taking pictures and videos in the mountains and at home. there have been on numerous occasions that i have experienced things that i can't explain, or for that matter don't understand why i able to see the things that i have seen. but i can tell you that i have communicated with something that looked human to me but was accompanied by five other grays. the human looking girl acknowledged to me that she was with the grays as she was holding hands with one of the grays.It was not a threatening experience that i had, i would have to say they were friendly and did not try to harm me in any way. i have got many more amazing pictures and videos that i will show you and go into further detail about when you contact me.
content.summary: I was hoping you could help me understand, what i have been seeing in the last couple of months.

content.detailedDescription:
I had stepped outside and was standing in front of my garage enjoying the evening the night of august 16th about 8:40 pm when i saw what appeared to be a meteor traveling from west to east.  it caught my eye because it was big glowing and heading my way.  it took a moment before i realized that meteors typically go from east to west.

it stopped and hovered for nearly two minutes and a second almost pin sized (tiny) dark object merged with the glowing object arriving from the east and then the objects just kept going up until it disappeared.  
  
i was able to snap two decent pictures with my cell phone one prior to it stopping and the second after it had been stopped for a few moments.  regretfully there was not time to enter my home and get a more suitable camera.  i have the photos still on my cell and do not intend to delete them.  

with in minutes two military jets flew over the area.  they seemed to be looking for something because they made several passes but that could have been coincidence.  (i assume military only because of the sonic booms.)
content.summary: Meteor like moving from west to east then stopped before assending to nothing

content.detailedDescription:
I hope i have filled in the fields required!
i am doing this on behalf of the lady mentioned... i am the secondary e-mail (heidi niel) and i am in the uk. hence i cannot help nikki directly. she is terrified...This appears to be now happening to her son too...Who infact witnessed or heard "them" talking to her at the time mentioned today!
she has history of abductions....The details of which she will inform you. her son too has been abducted also apparently and has scars....Please please help this lovely lady as her son is talking suicide (17 years old)
kind regards
 
heidi niel
uk
content.summary: History of abductions son being abducted also son witnessed current event

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting near the legends


it was about 1:50 pm, sunday september 30th, 2013. my mother-in-law and i were driving west on parallel, in kansas city, ks. headed towards the legends, shopping center. my gps said in .2 of a mile exit right onto 435 south, which made me look upward towards the highway sign. the sky was blue and cloudless. i saw a glimmering silver narrow rectangular shaped object flying north, or to the right in the sky. it was high up. i said look, to my mother-in-law. as fast as i could blink twice it turned white. she saw it. just that quickly a stream of white curled smoke came off the lower right side. then it completely disappeared, even the smoke. i said, what in the world was that? ���she couldn't figure out what we saw either. the whole event was very fast, probably about a minute!
content.summary: Rectangle, sliver of an almond, slightly domed in center

content.detailedDescription: For four days in a row my girlfriend and have went on our balcony facing sw to  smoke a cigarette(a pack a day so we othere quite a bit) and there has been a light brighter than any star, plane, satellite.. it is to the sw varying from 215���-240���.  we have lived here for a while and leaned on that balcony looking out thousands of times, but the past week has been unreal i'm a marine corps veteran and was the lead vehicle commander for convoys because my attention to detail is so fine tuned i would notice every new piece of trash, change in landscape, and street, shop, vendor, and pretty much everything else after being through one time. this object will stay stationary and then disappear instantly.
content.summary: Fourth night in a row a brilliant light will be stationary for over fifteen minutes then disappear.

content.detailedDescription: I observed star like object 2 nights ago, looked through binoculars and looked like a round barb from a tree, but looked like an electrical sphere with barbs then planes were flying by next to it tried to take a pic but didnt work has affected our phone landline also/ i noticed it because it was in our atmosphere. it descended into horizon 2 hrs after i noticed around 8;30 pm
content.summary: Looked like a but through binoculars a white barbed electrical ? then descended in horizon

content.detailedDescription: i was on my way to have late breakfast at around 12:30pm or so ( not working that day ) when i notices the moon was still visible as a very light white shade that's way i looked up when i notice an object like a sphere that came very fast from my wright view on a none linear path to the left a bit wavy and very fast it darted into a cloud where it apparently stay as looking for cover i pulled over and waited for 5 minutes but nothing...  i could not believe my eyes since i just witness something the day before this was different not glowing no lights just dark colors uneven black and dark grey.
content.summary: I notice the moon was still visible at noon time thats way looked up then i saw the object darted into a cloud.

content.detailedDescription: it's lunch time and i'm going to the bank to cash my check as i get out of the car i began to smoke a cigarette it was a very nice day some small clouds...  i was looking at and airplane traveling west when i notice 2 more planes parallel traveling north... then i notice what it look like a star. i'm wondering why i could see a star in the afternoon? as i stared at this object it began to move and it stopped again and it moved again this time it moved into a cloud to its right ( my left ) as it entered the cloud i could tell than it was glowing very bright as it enter the clouds thick part i was not able to see it, i wanted to stay there and wait but being lunch time i had limited time to get back to work.
content.summary: I was looking at the planes on a beautful afternoon i notice a bright object stationa.Ty then it moved and stoped and moved again and when in the clouds

content.detailedDescription: On my way home at 9:30 p.M., i noticed bright lights in the sky that looked like stars.  i arrived home at 10:00 p.M.  i watched them from the front porch.  the lights were approaching toward the house with no sound.  as they got closer they were pulsing until the small light became dim and turned an amber color.  they began to descend toward the tree line.  the lights began to pulse again.  the small light became a little brighter then separated from the bigger one.  with lightning speed it crossed over the tree line to the neighbors property to the south east.  the bigger light then went below the tree line and out of my field of vision.  i went inside the house at around 10:45 p.M.
content.summary: Aerial sighting with two objects observed.

content.detailedDescription: Currently there in sw sky just above tree tops flashed colors, had a small tail for a few seconds, visible with eye and binoculars
content.summary: Bright cylinder object sw  sky above tree line, non moving now

content.detailedDescription: At 6:52 p.M. 27september in naperville illinois, i noticed one, than two objects low on the horizon. one object, glowing yellowish/white, in the west, much larger than venus. it faded in and out, from extremely bright, to dull, to invisible, and then back to extremely bright. 2nd object higher in the sky in west as well, about 10 degrees to the sw of first object. this object appeared briefly, moving east slowly, and than move off west very quickly. the first, brighter object, stayed stationary for about two minutes then scrambled west quickly. very large objects, but far away as well. this was around sunset, but were not satellites or planets- much more luminosity than venus or mars.
content.summary: 2 glowing discs low in western sky

content.detailedDescription: Around 1:30 am on the morning of 9/27/13 while stargazing on the back deck, i witnessed and recorded on video the sightings of 4-5 unidentified lights that ascended from the lake east of my location and moved silently over the neighborhood. the objects appeared one at the time 15 minutes or so apart and ascend from the lake area over the trees, i cannot say if they came from the lake itself but, i did see them ascend from the trees in that direction and travel silently in a south easterly direction. one of the first objects traveled west and i lost sight of it. i witnessed one other object last night ascending from the same area and traveling in the same south easterly direction. some of the objects appeared first as a single light changing color and then additional lights were flashing like it was a small helicopter however none of the objects made any noise that i could detect. the dogs in the area were not barking. please see the videos. i will post more of these sightings if they continue to occur. note: i also witnessed an orange/red fireball ascending towards my home from the south the morning of july 5'th of this year.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multiple flashing light/orb types changing shape and silently moving over neighborhood

content.detailedDescription: While sitting on the shore, after observing a very disturbing ufo, i saw a flash of white light, just above the big dipper.  shortly later, from the west, i observed a "star-like" light.  i watched it, and that's  when i noticed that it was moving in my direction.  having seen a couple of ufo's in the past, i did not panic, but sat still and watched it's progress, which was that it followed a straight path right in front of me!  i was shaped like a blimp (but i called it a jelly-belly, because it was illuminated from with an orange glow).  it traveled steadily from the west to the north east at a constant speed.  it had no exterior lights, sound, nor did it seem to threaten me.  i have owned an airplane and i know what they sound and look like.  as i just said no sound.  i was delighted to see another one so soon.  it simply traveled out of sight, and was gone.
content.summary: While star gazing i noticed a star like light to the west over lk michigan on aug 14, 2012, at approx ll:15pm.  i realized that the star was moving in my direction, and as it approaced me, i realized that it was a craft, orange in color , glowing from wit

content.detailedDescription:
This first time i saw this bright light i was sitting on my front porch.  it was dusk and this light (which i thought was a star)was very bright and shining off to the west.  i watched it for a while and noticed it was almost pulsing.  i live appx. 45 miles from a major airport and 5 miles from a small private airport, on a daily basis we see all types of aircrafts.  this however did not move.  not even a little bit?? so i started to record on my phone.  the video is not wonderful, and it looks more like a pulsing ball on the recording.  i decided i would try to see it better from my attic, but there was a larger tree blocking my view.  i went back to the front porch and it was gone?
the following night i saw the same thing in almost the exact same spot. i showed my husband and he told me it was just a star.  i didn't think much about it until tonight when i saw it again.  this time my husband was with me and saw it as well.  we decided to video it and look at it through binoculars.  the same pulsing ball as before on the video but it looked like it could be multiple lights through the binoculars.  we went to our second floor to get a better look and that's where we saw it move slowly up and down and back and forth.  it would dip below the tree line and come back up.  eventually it went down so far that we could no longer see it.  i am not sure what we saw, and being that i've seen it a few times it could be nothing...But i figured it was strange enough maybe someone else saw it.
content.summary: I have seen this bright light 3 nights this week. it is much brighter and larger than any other star and slowly moves eventually so far down below the treeline i can no longer see it

content.detailedDescription: Girlfriend and i were observing the night sky. very clear night.  we both are very interested in stellar observation and thinking and discussing the sun and planets and galaxies.  as we lay on the top of my jeep very comfortably we both watched and talked about the sky.  we pondered if a certain star was venus.  we pondered how our sun looks from other planets.  we pondered how earth looked in our galaky.  we talked about the speed of light and how amazing it is, how it humurously sparkles at us.  we witnessed shooting stars that were blurry....Quite a few...So we made it a mission to lay there for about an hour or so as we viewed the night sky hoping to see more shooting stars.  i joked that the shooting stars we wwere seeing were unusual, faded..So i wondered maybe it was due to the clear night and they were very far away.  i joked were they meteorites...Or aliens???Haha...Because who knows what form an alien might present itself.  we saw a few planes fly by....Then awed at a helicopter.  none too close together.  as we lay there i remember her directing my attention to this misty movement asking what is that?  almost directly 75 degrees in front of us...In a very regular vision field.  i could not answer.  it was moth like shape....Triangular bust seemed to have more points.  with appx 5 dull lights at its points.  maybe they seemed to pulsate,. but they were faint.  i wondered if it might be a stealth bomber with its lights off as it resembled having some sort of star like camoflauge...Knowingt that was unlikey..  it seemed very high in altitude...And moved so quickly i could compare it to moving 5-10 times faster than any the other two planes or any other plane ive ever seen.  it did not make a single noise.  as it continued in a straight path across the sky and our eyes both followed and heads turned watching and wondering, it slowly began to fade out of view  (which i am not sure most people could see, we both have exquisite vision, and she was surprised i could see what she was describing, she thought she was imagining , and i reassured no she hadnt been imagining)  we were both sober, and clear headed.  just observers.  i couldnt help but think it might be some military item, and i joked that if the military had craft like that, then we are really amazing.  i witnessed it a few moments longer than she, as it faded out of sight.  i begged for it to return in my mind, but to no avail.  i remember discussing past strange sightings in my life prior to seeing this happen, but none were this intriguing....Or defined.  or shared.  i can remember laughing at a certain constellation of stars in the distance saying look how they sparkle unlike the rest...Their must be life there!
content.summary: Laying on jeep observing clear night sky with girl.  originally to "watch planes fly by"  saw venus. milky way.  4-5 metorites.  2 airplanes.  helicopter.Then all i heard iswhat is that?Barely visible. star like camoflauge.Very fast. we have great vision.

content.detailedDescription: I was stood by the back door to my garden, it was thick white cloud, yet this dome shape bright light flashed, the next to it was a row of ascending lights, then flashes like little stars all around. by the time my husband got the camera it had stopped, but i can provide a sketch if needed.
content.summary: Dome with ascending lights then small flashes

content.detailedDescription: Cluster of orbs with very bright yellow lights. i first thought it was a helicopter but it had no noise or navigation lights.Object was on a striaght line path roughly 500 to 700 feet high and roughly 1/4 mile away traveling sw to ne. response from other witnesses was dissmissal to curious excitment until it moved out of sight.
content.summary: Cluster of orbs bright yellow-no noise-no navigation lights

content.detailedDescription: After arriving home from work around 10:30 pm, i was walking across the parking lot when i noticed a dark rectangle shaped object above the building and between 2 clouds. it seemed to be about 500ft above me,mostly black color body with 2 visable dim/dark grey lights or domes on the bottom edge. it was moving silently in a se direction, gave off no light, was fading away between the clouds but not in the clouds. i did not see the entire object, only the back corner as it faded. this event lasted about 5 seconds. i tried to rationalize what i saw by comparing it to planes,helicoptors,ballons,blimps,shadows,lights,large kites but nothing was the right match.
content.summary: Fading ufo over houston

content.detailedDescription:
As turned onto w. branch rd. my father said whats that.
when i looked up i seen a long line of red orange lights in a strait line.
we drove down and parked in the middle of the yard. watched these lights 
as they passed over there was no sound as they moved away they would vanish.
i thought i noticed them rotating hard to tell. 40 to 60 objects.
content.summary: 40 to 60 red orange orb like lights traveling to the southwest over oxford pa.

content.detailedDescription:
As turned onto w. branch rd. my father said whats that.
when i looked up i seen a long line of red orange lights in a strait line.
we drove down and parked in the middle of the yard. watched these lights 
as they passed over there was no sound as they moved away they would vanish.
i thought i noticed them rotating hard to tell. 40 to 60 objects.
content.summary: 40 to 60 red orange orb like lights traveling to the southwest over oxford pa.

content.detailedDescription:
This is the 7th time i have seen this thing along the rr tracks that run along the colorado river north of dot zero exit off of i 70. i have been seeing it for over 28 years. it seems to bee around the same area each time i have seen it. it seems to change its color to match the background and move very fast in any direction it wants to go. i have seen black hawk choppers around almost every time. strange. it just seems to be checking things out but what i have no idea?

i have been in this beautiful area for over 40 years and have seen a lot of strange things and black hawk choppers are always around when i have the sightings.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Small fast changing color.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i just parked in his driveway. objects were very bright redish orange with distinctive formation. witnessed from road side. at least 6 craft formed a large equilateral triangle shape formation before mingling with one another. i was very excited. they moved slowly. they then descended in a loose formation below the tree line which was less than a mile away from me and a fellow witness. after a couple minutes 3 of the craft arose back into view just above the tree line. one of the craft then headed west across the horizon and a moderate speed while the other two remained hovering then faded out. after a few more minutes two more arose from the same spot in the tree line. they hovered for 30 seconds or so then faded out of sight.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed from road side. at least 6 craft formed a large triangle shape formation before mingling with one another.

content.detailedDescription: On september 28th 2013 at 9;30 a.M. in the morning i was installing a fence when i wiped the sweat from my brow i happened to look up in the morning sky appeared to be crystal clear day then i seen a bright object none movement thought to my self wow that is a bright star for the morning being that it was the only one around, so, i continued with my work and kept glancing at it, then! that bright object seemed to be moving very slowly seem to be bright like phosphorus? the sighting for me seems it was following the raritan river south between n.J.& n.Y. close to the outer bridge crossing. kept an eye on it till it dissipated because of distance in morning sky. i tried to take photo of it but too high and phone camera not good for that.
content.summary: Wasn't sure what i was looking at, but something inside me knew the truth

content.detailedDescription: I was going to church for a bible study at st vincent's in richboro and it was before twilight and i noticed a very bright star.  i was thinking it might possibly be venus and right while i was looking directly at it the thing pulsates once and vanishes without a trace. gone.  like it had never been, while i was looking directly at it.  i have no explanation and there were no clouds nearby.  i saw something vanish while i was looking directly at it wondering if it might be venus!  it was freaky.
content.summary: It was a very bright star until it pulsates and vanishes right in front of me.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work, and was out smoking a cigarette. just looked up to see if it was cloudy. noticed a bright light that looked like a star except in was moving in jerky motions, back and forth, then stopping, then darting forward and then in reverse. as i watched i realised that there were atleast 5 or 6 more in the sky. very high altitude, but you could tell they were triangle in shape as the night sky was a different shade than the object. then i relized that as the objects moved, it appeared they were emitting very dull sparkes, that appeared to be filling in the sky. watched on and off for an hour.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangle craft. moved quickly in all directions

content.detailedDescription:
My first siting was in wildwood nj, during bike week. it was around 11:00 pm we took a walk on the beach. i wanted to walk in the water one last time before fall. i love to watch the stars it is something i do on a regular basis. i did not have direct contact with this ship. i only watch it and have watched more since. i watched this craft for about 25 mins. i didnt want to take my eyes off of it. i thought i would never witness something so incredible. i watched this ship light up the sky as if if were showing a search light. i watch a planes go straight across the sky while this thing hovered afer the plane passed it it took off with a speed like i havent seen and caught up with the plane went with it for a few seconds then like a stone on water skipped back to it original position. 
about 5 days later i noticed the same bright light but a few hours earlier in the day. in my mind i thought myself am i crazy, however with mine own eyes i saw just what i saw and im not the only one. these last few weeks there have been many lights many formations in my night sky. i have seen orange balls of light starlike lights, bright lights , lights that move together i want answers!I waited two weeks before i even mentioned this to my closest of friends, i didnt think i would ever witness such a thing. i thought it happepened and that is just that, it happened. these things have been in my night sky for weeks not nights not one two nights but weeks! i urge you to please come video something i cannot. i do not have the equipment to tape to measure only my memory which this has imprinted. i cannot dismiss what i see with my two eyes cannot explain and i am told i am crazy for thinking outside our capabilities. please contact me 1(856) 462- 4090 or 1(856) 765-7685
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Many lights, some in formation others throughout the atmosphere over a period of almost 4 weeks
